title: How to factory reset your Google Pixel
content:
Believe it or not, there are many reasons you’d want to factory reset your Google Pixel. Maybe there are bugs that only a reset could fix, or maybe you want to upgrade to the Pixel 6 Pro and need to sell your current Pixel. Either way, this guide will show you how to get it done safely.

more…

The post How to factory reset your Google Pixel appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Sometimes you just need a do-over, or you want to upgrade your phone. Follow along to learn how to safely factory reset your Google Pixel.
